pages.title: Wado Ichimonji
pages.text: Wado Ichimonji is a Sword Belonging to the Swordsman Roronoa Zoro, Wado Ichimonji can be Obtained as a Boss Drop from Roronoa Zoro or Bought from a Wandering Trader for 48 Emeralds.

pages.title: Sandai Kitetsu
pages.text: Sandai Kietsu is a Sword Belonging to the Swordsman Roronoa Zoro, Sandai Kietsu can be Obtained as a Boss Drop from Roronoa Zoro or Bought from a Wandering Trader for 16 Emeralds & 8 Diamonds.
